data.name: Overdrive
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Overdrive.
Jump into a massive multiplayer experience in either Battle Royale or Assault.

Battle Royale: Drop into a 50 player battle royale where the last person standing wins. Loot up and avoid the zone which will eliminate you if you try to escape it.

Assault: Gear up for the most action-packed multiplayer experience you will ever play. Assault has modes such as 12v12 Team Deathmatch where the team with the most amount of eliminations within five minutes wins. Respawning is enabled and there are many things to use to your advantage such as the destructible terrain.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to Overdrive.
Jump into a massive multiplayer experience in either Battle Royale or Assault.

Battle Royale: Drop into a 50 player battle royale where the last person standing wins. Loot up and avoid the zone which will eliminate you if you try to escape it.

Assault: Gear up for the most action-packed multiplayer experience you will ever play. Assault has modes such as 12v12 Team Deathmatch where the team with the most amount of eliminations within five minutes wins. Respawning is enabled and there are many things to use to your advantage such as the destructible terrain.
data.short_description: Drop into a large multiplayer experience with modes such as Battle Royale & Assault. Rise to the top using custom attachments from the weapon gunsmith and explore a war-torn island with many hidden secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-630
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
